>Dear All,
>
>I want know the Japanese books written about Code of the Samurai ,
Hagakure & bushido shohinsho ? 
>
>Warm Regards from Sri Lanka 
>
>Chameera
 
Hi Chameera,
 
Instead of reading up on the Hagakure or worrying yourself too much
about 'bushido' in general, I'd recommend you pick up 'Taming of the
Samurai', by Eiko Ikegami. It will give you a far more accurate picture
of Edo period samurai, though it can be tough reading at times - the
first few chapters in particular.
 
-AngusH
